name: World of Warships: Legends - Ultimate Edition
summary:
This version Includes: 
 
- Iwaki – Tier III Japanese cruiser 
- Arkansas – Tier III American battleship 
- Marblehead – Tier IV American cruiser 
- Gremyashchy – Tier IV Soviet destroyer 
- Anton Gurin – Soviet Commander 
- Unique 'Founder' permanent camouflage 
- Unique Founder's Flag 
- 60 days of Premium Account time 
- 6,000 Doubloons 
- 4,000,000 Credits 
- A big pack of boosters 
- Early access to the game, from April 12
